document_data.name: A.V.O.W. shelter
document_data.mainbody: The '''A.V.O.W. shelter''' (an acronym for Animal Victims of War) was an animal shelter in the [[Ravens Bluff/Tent City|Tent City]] outside of [[Ravens Bluff]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Working in conjunction with [[Marigold's Menagerie]], this facility sought to heal animals injured during [[The Three Womens War]] and find new homes for animals that lost their owners.
document_data.History: This facility was established in [[1370 DR]], following the Three Womens War, with the help of generosity from [[adventurer]]s.
document_data.Inhabitants: This facility was operated by [[Mindy Mufflefoot]] & [[Victoria Shadai]].
